channel.title: Nitrous 718
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/9vjy2r.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1klA6.png[/img][URL=http://"http://nitrous-rsps.net/cmps_index.php"]Homepage[/URL] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img][URL=http://"http://nitrous-rsps.net/forum.php"]Forums[/URL]
[SIZE="5"][COLOR="Red"]INTRO[/COLOR][/SIZE]
Hello! My name is Alex and i'm an Administrator here at NitrousRSPS, the server is currently being developed by NOSDuco our owner. He has been working hard to add new content to the base and the server will be up and running publicly in about 6 days and will be loaded with content, As for now Jon (The head Administrator) and I are currently working on getting the forums 100%. What we currently need is a forum base to be ready for when Nitrous launches so feel free to register [URL=http://"http://nitrous-rsps.net/cmps_index.php"]here[/URL]. As I mentioned earlier the server should be up soon and we are looking forward to hosting the project and having loads of fun with the community. So stay tuned on the website for daily updates on the progress of the server.
[SPOILER="Click for features"][B][SIZE="5"][COLOR="Red"]Features[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]
Fully functioning QBD Fulling functioning KBD Fully functioning Kalphite Queen All skills trainable Dungeoneeering Fully working GE buy and sell Custom polypore staff Full Jadinko Lair Corpral Beast Nex Godwars Full Barrows Glacors Bork Daganoth Kings Jad Warriors Guild Duel Mage Bank Fight Pits West Pk East Pk Edgeville Working Money Pouch Near perfect swicthing Great exp rates Great economy 728 cache Zombie minigame Recipie for disaster minigame Squeal of Fortune Working bank tabs[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER="Click for media"][B][SIZE="5"][COLOR="Red"]Soon to be Added[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]
Still waiting for our developer to add a full list.
[B][SIZE="5"]Media[/SIZE][/B]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ee7Q8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/16WCl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/waLwF.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BSSbE.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ehu5J.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/m9sjzr.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9HsWF.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uv6tq.png[/img][/SPOILER]
Click for Support signature
[SPOILER="Click for Support sig"][url=http://nitrous-rsps.net/cmps_index.php][img]http://i.imgur.com/Kghtp.png[/img][/url]
just copy this code: [CODE]url=http://nitrous-rsps.net/cmps_index.php]img]http://i.imgur.com/Kghtp.png[/img][/url] make sure you add the two brakckets[/CODE]
This is the url for the picture: [CODE]http://i.imgur.com/Kghtp.png[/CODE]
[/SPOILER] MORE MEDIA COMMING SOON![/CENTER]

item.description:
@JonMosic wrote:

[CENTER]
Homepage
Forums

[SIZE=“5”][COLOR=“Red”]INTRO[/COLOR][/SIZE]

Hello! My name is Alex and i’m an Administrator here at NitrousRSPS, the server is currently being developed by NOSDuco our owner. He has been working hard to add new content to the base and the server will be up and running publicly in about 6 days and will be loaded with content, As for now Jon (The head Administrator) and I are currently working on getting the forums 100%. What we currently need is a forum base to be ready for when Nitrous launches so feel free to register here. As I mentioned earlier the server should be up soon and we are looking forward to hosting the project and having loads of fun with the community. So stay tuned on the website for daily updates on the progress of the server.

[SPOILER=“Click for features”][SIZE=“5”][COLOR=“Red”]Features[/COLOR][/SIZE]
